Posts.Content: FrenchPorsche wrote: I’m new to this site and feeling apprehensive. I attended the breast clinic on Saturday (my appointment was due two weeks earlier but was postponed twice as the consultant was stuck in Pakistan). My referral was due to some nipple discharge on my left breast. Anyway, it seems from the mammogram and ultrasound that the left side is fine, but the radiologist found a susp area in my right breast and performed a core needle biopsy. I’ve been told that I have an appointment at 3pm today provided they have had a chance to review the results. I think I would have heard by now if they were going to postpone it. I am currently feeling a bit stressed and worried. It’s hard not to dwell on it. Dx 3/13/2019, DCIS, Right, Stage 0 Dx 3/27/2019, DCIS, Right, 6cm+, Stage 0 Surgery 4/17/2019 Lymph node removal: Sentinel; Mastectomy: Right; Reconstruction (right): Silicone implant Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Results today (hopefully) FrenchPorsche FrenchPorsche
